oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Slim Rhodes And His Mother's Best Mountaineers radio show - #157 - WMC
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Slim Rhodes And His Mountaineers (styles as Slim Rhodes And His Mother's Best Mountaineers) radio show for WMC-AM, Memphis, Tennessee, sponsored by Mother's Best flour. Listed as show #157 as part of the daily Slim Rhodes And His Mother's Best Mountaineers radio show. Mentioned band members include Slim Rhodes, Speck Rhodes, Dusty Rhodes and Danny Holloway. WMC-AM announcer Russ Hodge.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Slim Rhodes; Mountaineers
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Opening statement (Russ Hodge) -- Opening theme -- Russ Hodge introduces Slim Rhodes -- Slim Rhodes and Speck Rhodes talk -- [Unidentified fiddle tune] (Dusty Rhodes fiddle) -- Mother's Best plug (Slim Rhodes and Speck Rhodes) -- Slim Rhodes introduces the next tune -- I Love You So Much It Hurts Me (Slim Rhodes) -- Russ Hodge introduces the comedy routine -- Skunk Hollow comedy routine (Slim Rhodes and Speck Rhodes) -- Slim Rhodes introduces the next tune -- Where The Soul Of Man Never Dies (Dusty and Speck) -- Mother's Best plug (Slim Rhodes and Speck Rhodes) -- Closing statements -- Closing theme
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WMC-AM (Radio station : Memphis, Tenn.); Slim Rhodes And His Mountaineers; Rhodes, Dusty (Musician); Rhodes, Slim; Rhodes, Speck; Hodge, Russ, 1911-1999;
